Name: ID
Description: Uniquely identifies this as a SunSpec Inverter  Modbus Map; 101: single phase, 102: split phase, 103: three phase

Name: WH_SF
Description: AC Lifetime Energy production scale factor

Name: DCA
Range of values: Not supported if multiple DC inputs; current can be found in Multiple MPPT model

Name: DCA_SF
Range of values: Not supported if multiple DC inputs.

Name: DCV
Range of values: Not supported if multiple DC inputs; voltage can be found in Multiple MPPT model

Name: DCV_SF
Range of values: Not supported if multiple DC inputs.

Name: DCW
Range of values: Total power of all DC inputs
